attributes.additional_details:
In the Daily mail a new type of energy production was invented clean carbon neutral energy and most importantly cheap. http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/moslive/article-2001548/Electron-Model-Many-Applications-Technology-save-world.html

Not only would this create clean energy but the particle accelerator can be used to target cancer cells, i want the government to invest in thorium nuclear plants and not wind power which would cut the cost's to a squeezed public freeing up money to be spent in the wider economy.
